name: transparent to
description:
This is 'transparent to', a new video game from Outhouse Media. The game, which will be made by Telltale Games, was created by the aforementioned developer and will be available on the App Store soon.
Outhouse Media created the game for the mobile entertainment and video game community in 2013. The game operates very much like a second-person shooter, with the player controlling a character called the "Amir" and entering missions and challenges. This video game is designed to be a multiplayer online role-playing game, and will be free to all players. It is scheduled to be released in 2018. How do you play the game? The game features a story-driven storyline, characters from different eras and cultures and puzzles to solve. Many of the NPCs will appear in the game from up to five generations ago, such as the ancient king of Egypt, Roni, and the ancient Egyptian priests, accidentally transported to the modern day through the use of virtual reality. You also will have the opportunity to interact with other players from all over the world, from Papua New Guinea to Mexico. The game was created by the indie developers and staff at Outhouse Media. You can find the official app for the game here. However, it will also be available for free download on the App Store soon. The game was originally released in 2013 and there is already a working copy of the game available on the App Store. Outhouse Media will premiere the game next month at
